source.name: Boston as a Leader in National Institutes of Health Awards for 16 Consecutive Years
source.description: Boston leads the nation once again in NIH funding for 16 years in a row, having received a total of $21.5 billion. Details about funding sources and distributions are found in this report by the BRA's LifeTech initiative and Research Division.
